ygData.subject: Re: bloodstone rings
ygData.msgSnippet: Zero value other than what an NPC will pay.  You cannot alter the common loot jewelry.  Sell it and buy some jeweling supplies for yourself.
ygData.messageBody:
Zero value other than what an NPC will pay. You cannot alter the
common loot jewelry. Sell it and buy some jeweling supplies for
yourself.

--- "Dorris, Bob" <bob_dorris@...> wrote:
> From: "Dorris, Bob" <bob_dorris@...>
>
> Other than nice loot for teen leveling adventures
> are there any other uses
> for these, or other basic jewelry found on corpses?
> I have heard people
> wanting to buy gold rings as well.
>
> Anyone shed some light upon these subjects?
>
>
> Eriq
> Innoruuk Server
